Title: Search for flights
Steps: Open flight booking system | Enter source | Enter destination | Select date | Click search
Expected: Available flights are displayed with prices and seat classes

Title: Select a flight
Steps: Search for flights | Choose a flight from the list | Select seat class | Click book

Title: Select seats during booking
Steps: Choose a flight | Select seat | Click continue

Title: Process payment with credit card
Steps: Select flight and seat | Enter credit card details | Click pay
Expected: Payment is processed successfully and confirmation email is sent

Title: Handle payment failure
Steps: Select flight and seat | Enter invalid payment details | Click pay
Expected: Error message is displayed and option to retry is available

Title: Process payment with debit card
Steps: Select flight and seat | Enter debit card details | Click pay
Expected: Payment is processed successfully and confirmation email is sent

Title: Process payment with digital wallet
Steps: Select flight and seat | Choose digital wallet option | Click pay
Expected: Payment is processed successfully and confirmation email is sent
